name: Medium (medium.com ) – Dark Grey profile fix
description:
A minor update to one of my favorite styles, "Medium (medium.com ) – Dark Grey" by UserStyles user apushkarev. Found here: https://userstyles.org/styles/137280/medium-medium-com-dark-grey .
This style fixes some breaks in the profile pages and on certain titles found on articles.
additional_info:
7-17-2018: Version 1.
Uses same code style so apushkarev can take it and add it to official style easily if they like it.
